content: 3x loaded Bitcoin collectibles and 1x Litecoin collectible for grabs.Lot 1: MoonBits 5k metal chip, titan finish (factory loaded 0.005 BTC)https://www.walletexplorer.com/txid/e57a0178c1b958cfb01b093999925e204f6f2776c0900f895f4d06c9e067c337Lot 2: MoonBits 1k metal chip, titan finish (factory loaded 0.001 BTC)https://www.walletexplorer.com/txid/6601e01b43828d1683d957a8a19a27cf3c74ec9f0c7f2bac9939186fbcfbb3f5Lot 3: Satori 1k plastic chip (factory loaded 0.001 BTC)serial 31360 | post-fork, lower mintage than pre-fork.Lot 4: FRESH 0.5 LTC metal coin (factory loaded 0.5 LTC)The LTC came directly from a miner, thus the name "fresh" - you cannot get any Litecoins cleaner than these.Album with full resolution pictures: https://imgur.com/a/693vkTvMore info on the moonbits: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0All coins are shipped in protective airtile.4 lots1) MB 5k2) MB 1k3) Satori4) FRESHSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.005 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0005 BTCEND TIME: NOVEMBER 26th, 2022, 17:00:00 EST (New York Time)TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/launch?iso=20221126T17&p0=179&font=cursive- Payment due within 24 hours of auction end -SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin, some Altcoins on request (dm BEFORE bidding, otherwise only BTC)TRACKED SHIPPING: within EU: $14, outside: $20NEW ACCOUNTS: newly created accounts (without positive trust for successful trades and without copper membership) are only allowed to bid if they sent a pm to me first and are willing to deposit a collateral (0.005 BTC) either directly to me or to a trusted escrow on this forum (MJ, Hhampuz, krogoth, Mopar etc.).I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust.
